tool_description:
Youmpa (www.youmpa.com) is a social platform for event promotion and selling. We operate mainly in Italy, but we plan to expand in the future .  

With this API you can access all Youmpa events, querying over by location, date ranges, categories and more.
name: Youmpa
title: Youmpa

api_list.name: events

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: If you are looking for events occurring in a specific date

optional_parameters.name: coords
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and Longitude (remember one of "coord" and "address" must be passed)

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The address (even just the city name) to find events around (remember one of "coord" and "address" must be passed)

optional_parameters.name: distance
optional_parameters.description: (in Kilometers) the max distance from "coordinates" or "address"
